description:
Reproducing the problem is simple.   The environment must be using nova-network and the VLANManager:

1. Create a VM 
2. Initiate a resize via the CLI (nova resize <instance uuid> <flavor id>
3. Wait for the resize to get into VERIFY_RESIZE 
4. Issue a resize revert (nova resize-revert <instance uuid>
5. Observe the fireworks

This is definitely a problem with stable/grizzly and likely impacting master as well.
title: Resize revert operations fail with stack traces
